welcome_message_body: Welcome to Barrington, where the charm of small-town living meets the excitement of a bustling city. Known for its beautiful parks, delicious restaurants, and friendly community, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights at T. F. Green Airport.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: This concourse serves domestic flights operated by American Airlines, Delta Air Lines, and United Airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: This concourse serves domestic flights operated by Southwest Airlines and international flights operated by Norwegian Air Shuttle.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at State Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The international terminal at State Airport serves flights to and from destinations around the world.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network throughout the terminal.
Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at New Bedford Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at New Bedford Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network throughout the terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Memorial Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Memorial Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
